content: AbbVie Inc has bought a priority review voucher from United Therapeutics Corp for $350 million that will allow it to accelerate the review process for one of its drugs.
name: United Therapeutics Corporation
title: AbbVie buys special review voucher for $350 million

content: Aug 19 AbbVie Inc has bought a priority review voucher from United Therapeutics Corp for $350 million that will allow it to accelerate the review process for one of its drugs.
name: United Therapeutics Corporation
title: AbbVie buys special review voucher for $350 mln

content: March 10 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said it had approved United Therapeutics Corp's drug to treat neuroblastoma  a rare form of cancer that most often occurs in young children.
name: United Therapeutics Corporation
title: FDA approves United Therapeutics' drug for treating cancer in children

content: * Analyst expects drug to cost $150 000 per patient per year   (Adds analyst comment  background)
name: United Therapeutics Corporation
title: UPDATE 2-FDA approves United Therapeutics' drug for children's cancer
